Leading Performance with Impact

Complete the learning and challenge a colleague to unlock AI's potential together. 
Let’s take on the #GenAIChallenge!
Explore Now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=23a49b6d0f&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

Leading Performance with Impact


We piloted a new programme to introduce Chalhoub Group's Performance Management philosophy. It includes elements related to setting goals, communicating clear performance expectations, delivering regular, honest and unbiased feedback, providing relevant Learning and growth opportunities, evaluating performance, identifying career paths and recognising top performers and talent. 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/3f590519-d617-5f0d-65c2-92c3a073d6b8.jpg> 	
	

Women in Leadership Meets BOLD Programme


We proud to share highlights from the closing ceremony of our flagship programmes, BOLD and Women in Leadership (WIL). The event brought together two vibrant cohorts for a meaningful exchange of insights and accomplishments. We were honoured to welcome Patrick Chalhoub and Wassim Eid, and other senior leaders joined us to celebrate this milestone, highlighting our commitment to leadership excellence, innovation, and diversity while recognising the incredible growth of our talented leaders.

Luxury Tech Team Alignment


What better way to wrap up the year than by crafting a solid strategy for the year ahead while strengthening bonds through engaging teambuilding activities? A heartfelt thank you to the Luxury Tech team for making this team alignment truly unforgettable! Here's to turning plans into impactful actions in the coming year.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/2846235b-bdf4-669a-372f-30220272414a.jpg>
